Bachelor in Statistics from the [University of Costa Rica (UCR)](https://www.ucr.ac.cr/), with graduation scheduled for February 2025. Currently, I perform research roles in two academic institutions: Junior Researcher at the [Anker Research Institute](https://www.ankerresearchinstitute.org/) and Research Assistant at the [Institute of Social Research (Instituto de Investigaciones Sociales, IIS)](https://iis.ucr.ac.cr/) of the UCR. My research interests include inequality and poverty studies, wage studies, and applied multivariate statistics for the social sciences. When I'm not studying, I create charts with `ggplot2`.

{{< bi geo-fill size=1em >}} Cartago, Costa Rica.
